remarks: Decompose the preimage of a constant times a function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2014.)
statement:
i1fmulc.2 $e |- ( ph -> F e. dom S.1 ) $.
i1fmulc.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
i1fmulclem $p |- ( ( ( ph /\ A =/= 0 ) /\ B e. RR ) -> ( `' ( ( RR X. { A } ) oF x. F ) " { B } ) = ( `' F " { ( B / A ) } ) ) $.
